name: King of the Eggs
description: Do you like your friends scrambled or sunny side up?Forget deviled eggs, these are the only eggs you are going to want to serve at your party from now on. Welcome to Eggorias! A land where you and your friends will compete in the wildest most exciting egg smashing competition the world has ever seen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 2500 MB available space
